name: Champions
description:
Champions adds elite mobs champions to the game with enhanced stats, unique abilities affixes, and extra loot. Any hostile mob can become a champion. The mod is highly customizable via config, allowing players to balance difficulty.
§eAdaptable§r - Champion will take less and less damage from the same consecutive damage type
§bArctic§r - Continuously fires homing projectiles that will slow anyone they hit
§dDampening§r - Reduces the damage of indirect attacks
§4Desecrating§r - Periodically spawns a cloud of harming underneath its target
§eHasty§r - Drastically increases movement speed
§2Infested§r - Attacking and being attacked will spawn silverfish that will attack its target
§3Knocking§r - Increased knockback from attacks, which will also slow targets for a small period of time
§cLively§r - Regenerates 1 health per second. This increases to 5 health per second when not attacking or pursuing any targets.
§6Molten§r - Continuously fires homing projectiles that will damage and burn anyone they hit and grants fire resistance
§eMagnetic§r - Periodically pulls targets towards itself
§8Paralyzing§r - Small chance per attack to "jail" targets, making them unable to move positions for a few seconds
§8Blinded§r - You have a chance to be Blinded for couple of seconds when a champion attacks you and hits you
§2Plagued§r - Infects nearby creatures with a Poison effect
§5Reflective§r - A small portion of damage is reflected back at the attacker
§fShielding§r - Periodically shields itself from all damage
